H0.text: Wind turbines are widely used energy sources that are nonrenewable and also a source of greenhouse gas emissions.

H1.text: Hydroelectric dams are widely used energy sources that are nonrenewable and also a source of greenhouse gas emissions.

H2.text: Fossil fuels are widely used energy sources that are nonrenewable and also a source of greenhouse gas emissions.

H3.text: Solar cells are widely used energy sources that are nonrenewable and also a source of greenhouse gas emissions.

A4.text: Over 70% of the greenhouse gas emissions due to human activity in 2022 was carbon dioxide (CO2) released from burning fossil fuels.

A5.text: In 2023, 77% of primary energy consumption in the world and over 60% of its electricity supply were from fossil fuels.
